video.title: Marvel's Avengers Assemble
video.synopsis: After Iron Man persuades his fellow superheroes to reunite, the Avengers combine their skills to battle both longtime foes and deadly new villains.

episodes.synopsis: When Captain America is apparently destroyed by Red Skull, Iron Man reunites the team to avenge him.
episodes.title: The Avengers Protocol: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: When Red Skull steals Tony Stark's armor, the Avengers must put aside their differences to stop him.
episodes.title: The Avengers Protocol: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: Rookie Falcon stands alone to stop an Earth invasion after the Avengers fall to the Space Phantoms.
episodes.title: Ghost of a Chance

episodes.synopsis: Thor believes he must sacrifice himself to save the world from Doctor Doom and the Milgard Serpent.
episodes.title: The Serpent of Doom

episodes.synopsis: To save Black Widow, Captain America leads the team into a battle against a former World War II ally.
episodes.title: Blood Feud

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers are outgunned by the Super-Adaptoid, and Captain America is the last man standing.
episodes.title: Super Adaptoid

episodes.synopsis: An all-powerful super-being arrives as the savior of Earth, but his methods become too extreme.
episodes.title: Hyperion

episodes.synopsis: Hawkeye and Black Widow take on a covert SHIELD mission to bring in the son of a supervillain.
episodes.title: Molecule Kid

episodes.synopsis: Hulk is the strongest there is, but when Attuma attacks, he's forced to prove it or perish trying.
episodes.title: Depth Charge

episodes.synopsis: Doctor Doom takes command of the Asgardian Destroyer armor, and Thor has to trust Loki to stop him.
episodes.title: Doomstroyer

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers learn what it's like to walk in Hulk's shoes when a Gamma attack transforms them.
episodes.title: Hulked Out Heroes

episodes.synopsis: The shape-shifting mischief maker Impossible Man makes Falcon the star of his action movie.
episodes.title: Avengers: Impossible!

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man and Captain America disguise themselves as villains to infiltrate Red Skull's Cabal.
episodes.title: In Deep

episodes.synopsis: When Hulk crash-lands on Earth with amnesia, he only remembers that the planet is doomed.
episodes.title: Hulk's Day Out

episodes.synopsis: Thor returns from Asgard to find Earth under the rule of Doctor Doom, who changed the past to ensure the Avengers never formed.
episodes.title: Planet Doom

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers start to see how tough the Cabal really is and just how much strength they'll need to find in each other to take them down.
episodes.title: Bring on the Bad Guys

episodes.synopsis: When Tony becomes too reliant on his tech, Cap challenges him to go without it for one full day.
episodes.title: Savages

episodes.synopsis: Hulk and Hawkeye suddenly find themselves stuck in a death match at the hands of the intergalactic broadcasting master, Mojo.
episodes.title: Mojo World

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers put their lives at risk to protect none other than Doctor Doom.
episodes.title: The Ambassador

episodes.synopsis: Odin comes to the Avengers Tower demanding that his son cease his "fun" on Earth and return to Asgard.
episodes.title: All-Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers and the Cabal have a huge confrontation that leaves the team forever changed.
episodes.title: By The Numbers

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man attempts to lead Galactus away from Earth to another planet but the Avengers run into the Guardians of the Galaxy who have other ideas.
episodes.title: Guardians and Space Knights

episodes.synopsis: Falcon's mom is coming to visit, and she has no idea he's an Avenger.
episodes.title: One Little Thing

episodes.synopsis: When the Circus of Crime rolls into town, Hawkeye's dark past begins to surface and puts the Avengers in danger.
episodes.title: Crime and Circuses

episodes.synopsis: Tony's confidence is shaken after he inadvertently puts Falcon in harm's way.
episodes.title: Exodus

episodes.synopsis: With the Tesseract now in the hands of the Cosmic Skull, Tony realizes teaming up with the rest of the Cabal might be their only chance for victory.
episodes.title: The Final Showdown

episodes.synopsis: After learning of a villain far more dangerous than Red Skull or the Cabal, the Avengers travel to a gamma-high city seeking an ally called Arsenal.
episodes.title: The Arsenal

episodes.synopsis: To prevent Thanos from finding the powerful Infinity Gems, the Avengers and Arsenal travel to the moon, where they seek the help of Uatu the Watcher.
episodes.title: Thanos Rising

episodes.synopsis: Hulk and Thor are transported to Valhalla, where they must fight to determine who is the strongest, while Loki invades Earth with a skeleton army.
episodes.title: Valhalla Can Wait

episodes.synopsis: The Winter Soldier kidnaps Red Skull before the Avengers can retrieve valuable information from their old nemesis that could help defeat Thanos.
episodes.title: Ghosts of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Black Widow and Hawkeye ally with the Atlanteans to stop Attuma's battalion from destroying Atlantis and gaining control of the beast Giganto.
episodes.title: Beneath the Surface

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious new villain called Nighthawk defeats the Avengers one by one, using countermeasures formerly developed by Falcon at S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.title: Nighthawk

episodes.synopsis: The Time Gem becomes attached to Tony's arc reactor, reverse-aging him to a child while also pulling dinosaurs and futuristic robots into the present.
episodes.title: The Age of Tony Stark

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers are put to the test when Modok uses the Mind Stone to assume control of S.H.I.E.L.D. and forces the teammates to swap minds.
episodes.title: Head to Head

episodes.synopsis: In an alternate universe created by the Reality Stone, the Avengers discover they're the villains while Squadron Supreme are Earth's mightiest heroes.
episodes.title: The Dark Avengers

episodes.synopsis: Thor, Hulk and Hawkeye travel to Asgard for the Learning Games but must stop a collision with Earth, part of Loki's Space Stone-powered escape plan.
episodes.title: Back to the Learning Hall

episodes.synopsis: Stranded in a realm where his tech doesn't work, Falcon must prove to himself and Hawkeye that he's still a hero without his upgraded weaponry.
episodes.title: Downgraded

episodes.synopsis: After she has a vision of Tony using the Infinity Stones to become Emperor Stark, Black Widow plans with Thor to rid Earth of the stones forever.
episodes.title: Widow's Run

episodes.synopsis: Thanos has collected all the Infinity Stones, so the Avengers make a final, desperate effort to stop him before he seizes control of the universe.
episodes.title: Thanos Triumphant

episodes.synopsis: Iron Man and Captain America try to rebuild their relationship, until Cap discovers that Tony is concealing dangerous information about Ultron.
episodes.title: Crack in the System

episodes.synopsis: A resurgent and more powerful Ultron rises to capture Avengers Tower and Iron Man's Hall of Armors, leading to the dissolution of the Avengers.
episodes.title: Avengers Disassembled

episodes.synopsis: With the team divided and Avengers Tower wiped out, Tony seeks out Ant-Man, who helps him repair his armor before they team up against Modok.
episodes.title: Small Time Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Working for S.H.I.E.L.D. isn't everything Captain America's team had hoped for when they're instructed to obey dangerous orders unquestioningly.
episodes.title: Secret Avengers

episodes.synopsis: Cap and Tony learn to appreciate their differences when Ultron converts humans into Sentinels, forcing the Avengers to reunite to save the world.
episodes.title: The Ultron Outbreak

episodes.synopsis: When Ant-Man joins the Avengers, Hawkeye trains "the new guy" on Monster Island, unaware that Red Skull and an army of Mindless Ones are nearby.
episodes.title: The New Guy

episodes.synopsis: While the other Avengers square off against Hyperion, the Hulk must save the day by fighting the Squadron Supreme's fastest member, Speed Demon.
episodes.title: Terminal Velocity

episodes.synopsis: To atone for his past actions, Ant-Man brings his former allies to justice, leading the Avengers into battle with the Squadron Supreme's Dr. Spectrum.
episodes.title: Spectrums

episodes.synopsis: Thor is convinced that Zarda wants to defect from Squadron Supreme, but Hulk knows better and must protect Thor from Zarda's duplicitous ways.
episodes.title: Midgard Crisis

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers are challenged by the fully formed and incredibly powerful Squadron Supreme for a battle that will end with only one team as the victor.
episodes.title: Avengers' Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: Unbeknownst to the Squadron Supreme and the rest of the world, the Avengers go into hiding to craft a plan to stop the Squadron once and for all.
episodes.title: Avengers Underground

episodes.synopsis: When an alien race from New Korbin begs the Avengers to save them from mysterious invaders, the team discovers Thanos is plundering the planet.
episodes.title: New Frontier

episodes.synopsis: When Thanos and the Black Order plan to conquer Earth by destroying the Avengers, the team discovers they're more than eight heroes: They're an ideal.
episodes.title: Avengers World
